EmailTemplate.description: Invite sent with SWASFAA Holiday Reception Campaign
EmailTemplate.name: SWASFAA Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Holiday Reception at SWASFAA 2005!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: While at the SWASFAA Conference, please join American Student Assistance at a Holiday Reception. Wednesday, December 7th 6:00-8:00pm in the Prefunction & Patio at the Hyatt Regency Tamaya, 1300 Tuyuna Trail, Santa Ana Pueblo, New Mexico.
